title: [stats] How Women and Men Use the Internet
content:
It may be of someone’s interest :

“How Women and Men Use the Internet”  
 [pewinternet.org/Women\_and\_Men\_online.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018094223/http:/www.pewinternet.org/pdfs/PIP_Women_and_Men_online.pdf) (815 KB)
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content: That should help Megacorp Inc. sell more beeer/household chemicals.~

Ah, sorry, if you care about my opinion, I am more interested in the stats I have seen yesterday in this movie : [http://www.climatecrisis.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018094223/http:/www.climatecrisis.net/ "http://www.climatecrisis.net/")

If people really cared, they'd put the greens in power.  
However, there were three federal bye-elections in Canada last week, and the Green Party came in fourth in all of them.  
Let's face it, we're gonna burn, drown, or get torn apart by storms, but in the meantime let's enjoy our SUVs and flat-panel TVs.
